DataCommand.Name: Dashboard.FetchGivingData
DataCommand.CommandText: SELECT [Church_Id] as ChurchId, [Fund_Id] as WidgetItemId, [SummaryNumber], [CountNumber], [Date] FROM [ChmContribution].[dbo].[View_Contribution_GetGivingData] as Giving (NOEXPAND) WHERE Giving.[Church_Id] = @ChurchId AND Giving.[Date] > @StartDate AND Giving.[Date] < @EndDate #WhereStr#
